name: Vanilla Ice Cream Soda
description: With very little effort you can make an awesome ice cream soda in your own kitchen.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup homemade or best quality store bought vanilla ice cream

recipeInstructions.text: In a tall glass, add vanilla syrup and milk and use a long spoon to mix together thoroughly. Top with several scoops of ice cream and 1/2 to 1 cup of seltzer depending on the capacity of your glass. Serve immediately.
